Oh great. Got a Scotrail guard who enjoys regular and prolonged use of the intercom system. No chance of any peace on this journey...

On this special day, I remember this and the small part I played in Trump's defeat in court... https://t.co/vVlruIDBx2
@Becks_simsy It was a bit embarrassing especially as we try to shop at your bakers whenever we are at our house in Seaton.
@Becks_simsy Hi, it was the morning of Sat. 3rd Dec. I remember the date as I was with friends & had to leave the shop & ask them for coins.
@Becks_simsy @SeatonTIC Yes, but only if you don't try to pay with Scottish money. Only place in Seaton that refuses to accept it. Why?
@Michael_Mooney Whoop whoop!!! Enjoy!
@Michael_Mooney Thanks, Michael. Hope you're enjoying/have enjoyed Japan. 😷
Thanks, Claire. Delighted to be appointed and really looking forward to it. https://t.co/rVBtCnlwQu
@FoodFruition @forFIKAsake Can they be as good as Antje's? @theyarncake
First visit to @AccentoCafe but won't be my last. Great housemade panini, fab coffee and friendly service. What's not to like?

@tall_j It was. As was the teriyaki salmon and miso with honey aubergine.... Am sure my first attempt at turkey will be just as good....not.
Going all traditional for Xmas Eve dinner. Making our own sushi, teriyaki salmon, aubergine with miso and honey, squid Japanese style....

@Broonjunior Yes, but you will have all the details of the Faculty's backup system in event of 'disaster', won't you? Can't find password...
@Broonjunior @madisonmitchel1 Peter G says IT trying to fix it but looks like need external third party help. Happy days.
@Broonjunior @madisonmitchel1 Well, lucky you. Not feeling at all sorry for you now! No chance of doing fee notes unless it gets fixed!
Any other fellow advocates having problems with Faculty's website and intranet today? @Broonjunior @madisonmitchel1 ?
Finally on my way home after 3 nights staying in Embra for work. Roll on le weekend! 🍸
